description: Manage Azure CDN Custom Domains to provide custom host names for endpoints.

commands.name: az cdn custom-domain create
commands.summary: Create a new custom domain within an endpoint.
commands.syntax:
az cdn custom-domain create --custom-domain-name
                            --endpoint-name
                            --profile-name
                            --resource-group
                            [--hostname]
                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az cdn custom-domain create -g group --endpoint-name endpoint --profile-name profile -n customdomain1 --hostname www.example.com

commands.name: az cdn custom-domain delete
commands.summary: Delete an existing custom domain within an endpoint.
commands.syntax:
az cdn custom-domain delete [--custom-domain-name]
                            [--endpoint-name]
                            [--ids]
                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--profile-name]
                            [--resource-group]
                            [--subscription]
examples: az cdn custom-domain delete -g group --endpoint-name endpoint --profile-name profile -n customdomain1

commands.name: az cdn custom-domain disable-https
commands.summary: Disable https delivery of the custom domain.

commands.name: az cdn custom-domain enable-https
commands.summary: Enable HTTPS for a custom domain. The resource name of the custom domain could be obtained using "az cdn custom-domain list".
commands.syntax:
az cdn custom-domain enable-https --endpoint-name
                                  --name
                                  --profile-name
                                  --resource-group
                                  [--min-tls-version {1.0, 1.2, none}]
                                  [--user-cert-group-name]
                                  [--user-cert-protocol-type {ip, sni}]
                                  [--user-cert-secret-name]
                                  [--user-cert-secret-version]
                                  [--user-cert-subscription-id]
                                  [--user-cert-vault-name]
examples: az cdn custom-domain enable-https -g group --profile-name profile --endpoint-name endpoint -n customdomain1
az cdn custom-domain enable-https -g group --profile-name profile --endpoint-name endpoint -n customdomain1 --min-tls-version 1.2

commands.name: az cdn custom-domain list
commands.summary: List all of the existing custom domains within an endpoint.

commands.name: az cdn custom-domain show
commands.summary: Get an existing custom domain within an endpoint.
examples: az cdn custom-domain show -g group --endpoint-name endpoint --profile-name profile -n customdomain1

commands.name: az cdn custom-domain update
commands.summary: Update a new custom domain within an endpoint.
commands.syntax:
az cdn custom-domain update [--add]
                            [--custom-domain-name]
                            [--endpoint-name]
                            [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--hostname]
                            [--ids]
                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--profile-name]
                            [--remove]
                            [--resource-group]
                            [--set]
                            [--subscription]

commands.name: az cdn custom-domain wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
